verses.verse: "If <S%H3588><s%> a prophet <S%H5030><s%> or <S%H176><s%> a dreamer <S%H2492><s%> of dreams <S%H2472><s%> arises <S%H6965><s%> among <S%H7130><s%> you and gives <S%H5414><s%> you a sign <S%H226><s%> or <S%H176><s%> a wonder, <S%H4159><s%>

and the sign <S%H226><s%> or the wonder <S%H4159><s%> comes <S%H935><s%> true, concerning which <S%H834><s%> he spoke <S%H1696><s%> to you, saying, <S%H559><s%> 'Let us go <S%H1980><s%> after <S%H310><s%> other <S%H312><s%> gods <S%H430><s%> (whom <S%H834><s%> you have not known <S%H3045><s%>) and let us serve <S%H5647><s%> them,'

you shall not listen <S%H8085><s%> to the words <S%H1697><s%> of that prophet <S%H5030><s%> or <S%H176><s%> that dreamer <S%H2492><s%> of dreams; <S%H2472><s%> for the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> is testing <S%H5254><s%> you to find <S%H3045><s%> out if you love <S%H157><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> with all <S%H3605><s%> your heart <S%H3824><s%> and with all <S%H3605><s%> your soul. <S%H5315><s%>

"You shall follow <S%H310><s%> <S%H1980><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> and fear <S%H3372><s%> Him; and you shall keep <S%H8104><s%> His commandments, <S%H4687><s%> listen <S%H8085><s%> to His voice, <S%H6963><s%> serve <S%H5647><s%> Him, and cling <S%H1692><s%> to Him.

"But that prophet <S%H5030><s%> or <S%H176><s%> that dreamer <S%H2492><s%> of dreams <S%H2472><s%> shall be put <S%H4191><s%> to death, <S%H4191><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> he has counseled <S%H1696><s%> rebellion <S%H5627><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> who brought <S%H3318><s%> you from the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> and redeemed <S%H6299><s%> you from the house <S%H1004><s%> of slavery, <S%H5650><s%> to seduce <S%H5080><s%> you from the way <S%H1870><s%> in which <S%H834><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> you to walk. <S%H1980><s%> So you shall purge <S%H1197><s%> the evil <S%H9563><s%> from among <S%H7130><s%> you.

"If <S%H3588><s%> your brother, <S%H251><s%> your mother's son, <S%H1121><s%> or <S%H176><s%> your son <S%H1121><s%> or <S%H176><s%> daughter, <S%H1323><s%> or <S%H176><s%> the wife <S%H802><s%> you cherish, <S%H2436><s%> or <S%H176><s%> your friend <S%H7453><s%> who <S%H834><s%> is as your own soul, <S%H5315><s%> entice <S%H5496><s%> you secretly, <S%H5643><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> 'Let us go <S%H1980><s%> and serve <S%H5647><s%> other <S%H312><s%> gods <S%H430><s%>' (whom <S%H834><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> you nor <S%H3808><s%> your fathers have known, <S%H1><s%>

of the gods <S%H430><s%> of the peoples <S%H5971><s%> who <S%H834><s%> are around <S%H5439><s%> you, near <S%H7138><s%> you or <S%H176><s%> far <S%H7350><s%> from you, from one end <S%H7097><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> to the other end <S%H7097><s%>),

you shall not yield <S%H14><s%> to him or listen <S%H8085><s%> to him; and your eye <S%H5869><s%> shall not pity <S%H2347><s%> him, nor <S%H3808><s%> shall you spare <S%H2550><s%> or conceal <S%H3680><s%> him.

"But you shall surely <S%H2026><s%> kill <S%H2026><s%> him; your hand <S%H3027><s%> shall be first <S%H7223><s%> against him to put <S%H4191><s%> him to death, <S%H4191><s%> and afterwards <S%H314><s%> the hand <S%H3027><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> the people. <S%H5971><s%>

"So you shall stone <S%H5619><s%> him to death <S%H4191><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> he has sought <S%H1245><s%> to seduce <S%H5080><s%> you from the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> who brought <S%H3318><s%> you out from the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> out of the house <S%H1004><s%> of slavery. <S%H5650><s%>

"Then all <S%H3605><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> will hear <S%H8085><s%> and be afraid, <S%H3372><s%> and will never <S%H3808><s%> again <S%H3254><s%> do <S%H6213><s%> such <S%H2088><s%> a wicked <S%H7451><s%> thing <S%H1697><s%> among <S%H7130><s%> you.

"If <S%H3588><s%> you hear <S%H8085><s%> in one <S%H259><s%> of your cities, <S%H5892><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> is giving <S%H5414><s%> you to live <S%H3427><s%> in, [anyone] saying <S%H559><s%> [that]

some worthless <S%H1100><s%> men <S%H376><s%> have gone <S%H3318><s%> out from among <S%H7130><s%> you and have seduced <S%H5080><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of their city, <S%H5892><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> 'Let us go <S%H1980><s%> and serve <S%H5647><s%> other <S%H312><s%> gods <S%H430><s%>' (whom <S%H834><s%> you have not known <S%H3045><s%>),

then you shall investigate <S%H1875><s%> and search <S%H2713><s%> out and inquire <S%H7592><s%> thoroughly. <S%H3190><s%> And if <S%H2009><s%> it is true <S%H571><s%> [and] the matter <S%H1697><s%> established <S%H3559><s%> that this <S%H2088><s%> abomination <S%H8441><s%> has been done <S%H6213><s%> among <S%H7130><s%> you,

you shall surely <S%H5221><s%> strike <S%H5221><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of that city <S%H5892><s%> with the edge <S%H6310><s%> of the sword, <S%H2719><s%> utterly <S%H2763><s%> destroying <S%H2763><s%> it and all <S%H3605><s%> that is in it and its cattle <S%H929><s%> with the edge <S%H6310><s%> of the sword. <S%H2719><s%>

"Then you shall gather <S%H6908><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> its booty <S%H7998><s%> into the middle <S%H8432><s%> of its open <S%H7339><s%> square <S%H7339><s%> and burn <S%H8313><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> its booty <S%H7998><s%> with fire <S%H784><s%> as a whole <S%H3632><s%> burnt <S%H3632><s%> offering <S%H3632><s%> to the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God; <S%H430><s%> and it shall be a ruin <S%H8510><s%> forever. <S%H5769><s%> It shall never <S%H3808><s%> be rebuilt. <S%H1129><s%>

"And nothing <S%H3808><s%> <S%H3972><s%> from that which <S%H9172><s%> is put under <S%H9172><s%> the ban <S%H9172><s%> shall cling <S%H1692><s%> to your hand, <S%H3027><s%> in order <S%H4616><s%> that the Lord <S%H3068><s%> may turn <S%H7725><s%> from His burning <S%H2740><s%> anger <S%H639><s%> and show <S%H5414><s%> mercy <S%H7356><s%> to you, and have <S%H7355><s%> compassion <S%H7355><s%> on you and make you increase, <S%H7235><s%> just <S%H3152><s%> as He has sworn <S%H7650><s%> to your fathers,

if <S%H3588><s%> you will listen <S%H8085><s%> to the voice <S%H6963><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> keeping <S%H8104><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> His commandments <S%H4687><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I am commanding <S%H6680><s%> you today, <S%H3117><s%> and doing <S%H6213><s%> what <S%H3477><s%> is right <S%H3477><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God. <S%H430><s%>
